package.name: suricata
package.descr: High Performance Network IDS, IPS and Security Monitoring engine by OISF.
package.build_options: security_barnyard2_UNSET_FORCE=ODBC PGSQL PRELUDE;security_barnyard2_SET_FORCE=GRE IPV6 MPLS MYSQL PORT_PCAP BRO;security_suricata_SET_FORCE=IPFW PORTS_PCAP GEOIP JSON NSS LUAJIT HTP_PORT;security_suricata_UNSET_FORCE=PRELUDE TESTS SC LUA
